title: The Ferris Wheel
overview: What happens when a sex-crazed, beautiful couple takes to the road looking for new experience? You get The Ferris Wheel. Jeremy and Kate Ferris open their lives to the joys and weirdness of their open marriage. An experience that isn't like any other. Jeremy is a millionaire who hasn't worked in years, never wants to settle down, and whose sexual desires know no limits. Kate is barely out of college, a swimsuit model, and sexually adventurous. Together they take viewers around the world. From New York to Bangkok, Jeremy and Kate take us on adventures in each city that are beyond unique. Jump on The Ferris Wheel with Jeremy and Kate late night Thursdays. It's a ride you will never forget.
